nodes.bodyText:
Agree cdh5x plugin is named badly.
My bad I thought we had separate plugins for hdp2x and hdp3x which is not the case (only hdpx   so no major in plugin name). Separation is done at template level.
We could use cdpx in that case but as long as cdp will be only dynamic "x" will be useless so cdp name is ok for me. Sorry for the noise

nodes.bodyText: Those files should be committed similar to what is done for cdh5x plugin for example : https://github.com/Talend/tbd-studio-se/blob/master/main/plugins/org.talend.hadoop.distribution.cdh5x/.project
Could you explain why, I always think  those files is related to my ide, not the plugin.

Yes those are ide related files so I agree they are not committed in standard java projects but here we are dealing with eclipse plugins so we are stuck with eclipse and it makes project / plugin import easier as it will be configured out of the box.
Should be renamed CDP7xxDistributionTemplate following renaming of the plugin.
This interface is empty so seems useless. Can be added back if needed in the future
Do we have similar file for cdh ?
